name: Stellar Wars (itch)
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Kevin A Moughtin - Commodore Business Machines Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1984. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5! 

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Travelling through the galaxy you are attacked by a squadron of stellar fighters. You have 30 seconds to shoot the down with your twin lasers and become the ace spaceman of the fleet. Do not let the fighters enter your space field or your controls will be disabled for a few valuable seconds of the fight. Beware of overheating your lasers.

Move aiming: Cursor keys
Fire: A or B

Move aiming: Arrow keys
Fire: X or Z

Stellar Wars - Commodore Ltd.
